articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The UK Supreme Court has ruled that the legal definition of a woman should be based on biological sex.
articles.title: Keir Starmer does not believe trans women are women, No 10 says

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The IMF said UK inflation will go up as bills rise, while economies will be hit by Trump tariffs.
articles.title: Three more UK interest rate cuts this year, predicts IMF

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Several names are in the fray as cardinals prepare to gather in the Vatican to elect Pope Francis' successor.
articles.title: Who will be the next Pope? The top candidates in an unpredictable contest

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The Vatican has released photos of Pope Francis in an open coffin, dressed in a red robe with the papal mitre on his head and a rosary in his hands.
articles.title: In pictures: Pope Francis lies in open coffin in Vatican chapel

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Russian military authorities say the blast in a warehouse is due to a fire.
articles.title: Large explosion at Russian ammunition depot east of Moscow

articles.description: Kneecap performed at a music festival in California where they ended their set with pro-Palestinian messages.
articles.title: Kneecap: Sharon Osbourne calls for US visas to be revoked after Coachella

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The region's chief minister said the attack was "much larger than anything we've seen directed at civilians in recent years".
articles.title: At least five killed after gunmen open fire on tourists in Kashmir

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The US suffers the biggest downgrade to growth among advanced economies, in the influential International Monetary Fund's latest forecast.
articles.title: Trump tariffs: US forecast to be hit hardest of major economies

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The pontiff's body will lie in St Peter's Basilica from Wednesday until Friday to allow mourners to pay their respects.
articles.title: World leaders from Trump to Zelensky to attend Pope's funeral

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: After being told she would never move again, Megan Dixon is preparing for an independent life.
articles.title: FND: 'I went into hospital for four days and came out two years later'
